org.concordion.ext.logging

Class LogMessageTooltipWriter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.concordion.ext.logging.LogMessageTooltipWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class LogMessageTooltipWriter
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.concordion.api.listener.AssertEqualsListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertTrueListener, org.concordion.api.listener.AssertFalseListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ExecuteListener, org.concordion.api.listener.SpecificationProcessingListener, org.concordion.api.listener.VerifyRowsListener, org.concordion.api.listener.ThrowableCaughtListener
    Writes any new log messages to tooltips when invoked by Concordion events.
